Package cardCounting

Class Ace5

java.lang.Object
cardCounting.BettingStrategy
cardCounting.Ace5
public class Ace5
extends BettingStrategy
Ace 5 betting strategy.

Extends the betting strategy superclass

  • Constructor Details

    • Ace5

      public Ace5​(int min_bet_in, int max_bet_in)
      Initializes the Ace5 card counting strategy.
      Parameters:
      min_bet_in - Represents the minimum value for the bet.
      max_bet_in - Represents the maximum value for the bet.

      (same parameters as the super class, BettingStrategy)

  • Method Details

    • updateCount

      public void updateCount​(Card card)
      Updates the counting variable based on a card

      If the card is an Ace, subtract one to the count;

      If the card is a Five, add one to the count.

      Specified by:
      updateCount in class BettingStrategy
      Parameters:
      card - Represents the card.

    • getNextBet

      public int getNextBet()
      Calculates the next bet that should be made based on the count. If the count is greater or equal to 2, then the bet is doubled (up to the maximum bet). Otherwise, the bet is set its minimum value
      Specified by:
      getNextBet in class BettingStrategy
